title: The Panda
creator_credit: Shanghai Scientific and Educational Film Studio
brief_description: The Panda is a survivor from ancient times and now is only found in the North of China. They were almost extinct, but the care by forest rangers and the people of China has assured their survival.
description: The Panda is a survivor from ancient times and now is only found in the North of China. They were almost extinct, but the care by forest rangers and the people of China has assured their survival.
